#summary How to install Bungeni Transcribe on Ubuntu

= Introduction =

Bungeni Transcribe has been developed and tested only on Ubuntu 9.04, Ubuntu 9.10 and Ubuntu 10.04 and may not compile/run on other operating systems. Support for Windows will be added as soon as the project is stable.

= Steps =

 {{{
sudo apt-get install libvlc-dev libqt4-dev subversion
sudo apt-get build-dep vlc
svn checkout http://bungeni-transcriber.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ bungeni-transcriber
cd bungeni-transcriber
make
./transcribe
}}}
